content:
1. Scroll linking. When link scrolling is on only the leftpanel scroll moves the two panels in sync. The rightpanel scrollbar should also do so. This was previously working as expected. 
2. Commit button indicator: background color changes are not working. button background remains blue even in unsaved state. 
3. Commit History- Current Working Draft. Please explain logic.

1. Scroll linking. When link scrolling is on only the leftpanel scroll moves the two panels in sync. The rightpanel scrollbar should also do so. This was previously working as expected. 
2. Commit button indicator: background color changes are not working. button background remains blue even in unsaved state. 
3. Commit History- Current Working Draft. Please explain logic. 
4. Our undo and redo buttons seem to have no coupled functions.

1. Rullningslänkning. När länkrullning är aktiverad ska endast den vänstra panelens rullningslist flytta de två panelerna synkroniserat. Den högra panelens rullningslist bör också göra det. Detta fungerade tidigare som förväntat.
2. Indikator för bekräftelseknapp: bakgrundsfärgändringar fungerar inte. Knappens bakgrund förblir blå även i osparat tillstånd.
3. Incheckningshistorik - Aktuellt utkast. Vänligen förklara logiken.
4. Våra ångra- och gör om-knappar verkar inte ha kopplade funktioner.

The Electron build completed successfully! The installer has been created at:

release/Diff & Commit AI Setup 1.2.1.exe

You can run this installer to test the Electron build with all the new features including the Projects system. The build includes:

Projects directory system with localStorage storage
Project name displayed in header
All the AI Summary and Undo/Redo removal cleanup from earlier

Done! The current project name now displays in the header after "Diff & Commit AI" with a / separator. The project name:

Shows in indigo color to stand out
Has a max-width of 200px with truncation for long names
Shows the full name on hover (tooltip)
Only appears when a project is loaded (otherwise just shows the app title)
The app should hot-reload with this change visible at localhost:5173.

Want to be an AI insider? Want to impress random people at parties? You'll have to know the spiel. In this branch, only a select few have first-name status, and you'll need to know who they are—all of them. Then you can drop those names like they're your best buddies. You'll be admired, considered wise and connected.

Take our quiz to see how far you've come towards AGI!

Earn your chops playing...

Who's Sam?
